original_text:
“The days are coming,” declares the Lord,
    “when I will make a new covenant
with the people of Israel
    and with the people of Judah.
korean_text: 여호와의 말씀이니라 보라 날이 이르리니 내가 이스라엘 집과 유다 집에 새 언약을 맺으리라

sentences.original_text: "The days are coming," declares the Lord,
"when I will make a new covenant
and with the people of Judah."
